last_episode_to_air.name: Miami Knows Best
last_episode_to_air.overview: Savannah feels pressured when Chase insists she spends time bonding with Emmy; Chase crushes Elliot's big dreams and to save his friendship, he has to pull out all the stops.

name: Growing Up Chrisley
overview: Chase and Savannah Chrisley embark on a cross-country move to prove they're independent grown-ups.

episodes.name: Chase & Savannah Fly the Nest
episodes.overview: Chase and Savannah Chrisley embark on a cross-country move to prove they're independent grown-ups.

episodes.name: A Strange Trip with Nanny Faye
episodes.overview: Faye, Chase and Savannah take a road trip to LA. Todd and Julie adjust to the kids being gone.

episodes.name: Welcome to La La Land
episodes.overview: Chase and Savannah move into their LA home and realize life in the city isn't what they expected.

episodes.name: Braveheart & Beauty Shots
episodes.overview: Savannah tries to start a beauty brand through social media while Chase has an acting assignment.

episodes.name: The Hollywood Hustle Hits Home
episodes.overview: Todd visits and finds that Elliot is Chase's manager and Savannah is in a revealing photoshoot.

episodes.name: Operation: Rescue Savannah
episodes.overview: Todd and Elliot think Savannah is in a cult while Chase tries to navigate the LA dating scene.

episodes.name: Starving Artists Unite
episodes.overview: Chase hustles to make money while Savannah tries to create an actual product for her Beauty Brand.

episodes.name: Say Goodbye to Hollywood
episodes.overview: Chase must give his biggest acting performance yet and Savannah tackles unfinished business.

episodes.name: Going for Gold
episodes.overview: Chase must give his biggest acting performance yet and Savannah tackles unfinished business.

episodes.name: Stressed For Success
episodes.overview: Chase rents the house for a photo shoot ; Savannah's stress prompts an emergency visit from Todd.

episodes.name: Peeping Todd
episodes.overview: Todd investigates if Nic is living with Savannah. Elliott botches an order for Chase's candle line.

episodes.name: Can't Buy Me Love
episodes.overview: While Chase navigates the LA dating scene, Savannah struggles to cope with her shopping addiction.

episodes.name: Rent-A-Nanny
episodes.overview: Savannah and Nic worry about being parents. Meanwhile, Nanny's LA visit takes a strange turn.

episodes.name: Lifeguarding for Dummies
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie crash Savannah's NYC business trip. Chase and Elliott decide to become lifeguards.

episodes.name: Boys Gone Wild
episodes.overview: Chase and Elliott get off the grid. Savannah's controlling tendencies push Nic away.

episodes.name: Newlywed Shame
episodes.overview: Cracks appear in Nic and Savannah’s relationship. Chase struggles with Savannah’s engagement party.

episodes.name: The Dating Shame
episodes.overview: Chase is worried his girlfriend is morphing into his mum, while Elliott tries to date Savannah.

episodes.name: Sassy Launch Party
episodes.overview: Savannah prepares for the launch of her makeup line. Chase and Elliott clash as roommates.

episodes.name: Boos Brothers
episodes.overview: Chase is pulled between Emmy and Elliott on Halloween. Savannah hires a new assistant.

episodes.name: Sleepless in Nashville
episodes.overview: Elliott teaches Savannah how to let loose; Chase struggles with insomnia before a big test.

episodes.name: Duck, Duck, Chase
episodes.overview: Chase ropes Todd into duck hunting with Emmy's brothers; Savannah helps with a drag photo shoot.

episodes.name: Naked and Afraid
episodes.overview: Nanny helps Savannah conquer her public speaking fear; Julie disapproves of Chase's big purchase.

episodes.name: The Yeastie Boys
episodes.overview: Savannah struggles to rejoin the dating world; Chase and Elliott start a kombucha brewing business.

episodes.name: Baa Humbug
episodes.overview: Chase is torn between Emmy and Julie during the holidays; Savannah and Nanny set out to get rich.

episodes.name: Whoa Baby
episodes.overview: Chase wants to deepen his relationship with Emmy and decides to take things to the next level; Savannah's recent trauma has her burying her head in work and missing out on life.

episodes.name: Spicing It Up
episodes.overview: Following Chase and Savannah Chrisley as they embrace adulthood. Now in their mid-20s, the siblings enter a new chapter in their lives as they navigate new and old relationships, businesses and family dynamics.

episodes.name: Raising The Bar
episodes.overview: Chase struggles to fulfill his promise of supporting Emmy's growing business; Savannah finds herself behind "bars" after making a bet with Chase.

episodes.name: Three's Company
episodes.overview: Chase and Emmy team up to find Elliot a girlfriend; Savanah deals with a shopping addiction at the insistence of Nanny and Chadd.

episodes.name: Sassy Takes South Beach
episodes.overview: Savannah gathers the gang for a Miami vacation, but when her girlfriends press her to find a man, Savannah worries love isn't in the cards; Chase's obsession with missing Emmy threatens to derail his guy's trip with Elliott.

episodes.name: Miami Knows Best
episodes.overview: Savannah feels pressured when Chase insists she spends time bonding with Emmy; Chase crushes Elliot's big dreams and to save his friendship, he has to pull out all the stops.
